story.text: NEW YORK Offshore driller Ensco International Inc. (ESV.N) will replace BellSouth Corp. BLS.N in the S&P 500 index after the close of trading on Wednesday, Standard & Poor's said.BellSouth has been acquired by AT&T Inc. (T.N) in a deal that closed after the end of trading on Friday, December 29.
story.title: ensco to replace bellsouth in s & p 500
